title: Could Eddie and Brian be the key to doing mental health well in The Archers?
text:
Welcome to our new weekly Archers column, where our Ambridge expert Kat Brown (even her cat is called Ambridge) will be discussing the key talking points of the greatest of all radio soaps

The village of Ambridge lives in a rather lovely bubble. Not one person lives with a chronic mental health problem, barely even a physical one - yet one in four people will experience this in their lifetime, and this week, Elizabeth Pargetter begged daughter Lily to return to university after a year supporting her - as though Elizabeth’s bout of depression last year was a nasty rash that had cleared up with a bit of Calamine.
